name: LEKLÅDAN
description:
In this game prototype, you are able to play one minigame that we've named Cat Bucket. You're 3 v 1 where one plays as the cat bucket who shoots balls at his opponents. The other 3 pick up the balls and score by shooting a ball inside the cat bucket.

Game project 2 at future games. We were tasked to make a game prototype within 6 weeks based on some requirements from an outside source. 

In our team, we were six people, who were the following

Pontus Söderlind - Project Manager

Kristofer Sell - Game Programmer

Carl Persson - Game Programmer

Olle Ferm - Game & UX Designer

Beatrice Vester - Game & UX Designer

Wes Ekman - Game & UX Designer

Erik Husman - Game & UX Designer
